it.emarolab.amor.owlInterface

Class ReasonerExplanator

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.emarolab.amor.owlInterface.ReasonerExplanator
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    OWLReferencesInterface.PelletReasonerExplanation 

    public abstract class ReasonerExplanator
extends java.lang.Object

    This class implements the basic interface for reasoner inconsistencies and explanation.

    Project: aMOR
    File: it.emarolab.amor.owlInterface.ReasonerExplanator
    Licence: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 3, 29 June 2007
    Author: Buoncompagni Luca (luca.buoncompagni@edu.unige.it)
    affiliation: DIBRIS, EMAROLab, University of Genoa.
    date: Feb 10, 2016

      protected abstract void notifyInconsistency()
      This method should print on console (or use showErrorDialog(String)) in order to show that an inconsistency occurred.
      protected void showErrorDialog(java.lang.String text)
      This method show a graphical panel to notify the user that an inconsistency occurred.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ReasonerExplanator

        protected ReasonerExplanator(OWLLibrary owlLibrary)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        owlLibrary - an object collecting all OWL entities belonging to an OWL reference

    • Method Detail

      • getExplanation

        protected abstract java.lang.String getExplanation()
        Returns:
        all the explanation that the reasoner can provide when an inconsistency occurs. Can be printed for debugging.

      • notifyInconsistency

        protected abstract void notifyInconsistency()
        This method should print on console (or use showErrorDialog(String)) in order to show that an inconsistency occurred.

      • showErrorDialog

        protected void showErrorDialog(java.lang.String text)
        This method show a graphical panel to notify the user that an inconsistency occurred.
        Parameters:
        text - the text to be notified to the user

      • getOwlLibrary

        protected OWLLibrary getOwlLibrary()
        Returns:
        the instance that points to all the objects of an OWL Reference. Initialised on constructor.

      • getLogger

        protected it.emarolab.amor.owlDebugger.Logger getLogger()
        Returns:
        the logging object associated to this class. Logging can be activated by the flag Logger.LoggerFlag.LOG_REASONER_EXPLANATION.
